pr_title: implement fix for hp-ux version parsing

timeline.message: implement fix for hp-ux version parsing

timeline.bodyHTML:
Suggested change
msgTemplate = "Failed to start agent - JVM version not supported: %s %s %s";
msgTemplate = "Failed to start agent - JVM version not supported: %s %s %s. To override Java version verification, set the "elastic.apm.disable_bootstrap_checks" System property to "true".";
timeline.author: eyalkoren

timeline.message:
Update apm-agent-core/src/main/java/co/elastic/apm/agent/bci/AgentMain.java

add self-documenting error message

Co-authored-by: eyalkoren <41850454+eyalkoren@users.noreply.github.com>
add hp-ux entry in supported JVM list
Merge branch 'master' of github.com:elastic/apm-agent-java into fix-hpux-version-parsing
